scripts.preinstall: npm i -g git+https://git@github.com/mohlsen/check-engine.git && check-engine && echo 'Use o node definido no engines e execute npm run install:global'
scripts.install:global: npm i -g npm@6.14.8 cordova@10.0.0 @ionic/cli@6.11.7 && npm run install:mac
scripts.install:mac: PLATAFORMA=$(uname -a | cut -c 1-6) && if [[ $PLATAFORMA == 'Darwin' ]]; then npm i -g ios-sim@9.0.0 ios-deploy@1.11.1 && gem install cocoapods; fi
scripts.cap:ios:add: npm run build && ionic capacitor add ios && echo 'Cria um projeto iOS com capacitor'
scripts.cap:ios:open: ionic capacitor open ios && echo 'Abre o projeto no xcode'
scripts.cap:ios:sync: ionic capacitor copy ios && echo 'Sincroniza web assets para o aparelho/simulador Apple'
scripts.cap:android:requirements: echo 'Android com Pie (API >= 28) e Google Play services'
scripts.cap:android:add: npm run build && ionic capacitor add android && echo 'Cria um projeto Android com capacitor'
scripts.cap:android:open: ionic capacitor open android && echo 'Abre o projeto no Android Studio'
scripts.cap:android:sync: ionic capacitor copy android && echo 'Sincroniza web assets para o aparelho/simulador Android'
